titleStmt.title: Gērochomia vasilikē King Solomons portraiture of old age : wherein is contained a sacred anatomy both of soul and body, and a perfect account of the infirmities of age, incident to them both : and all those mystical and ænigmatical symptomes expressed in the six former verses of the 12th chapter of Ecclesiastes, are here paraphrased upon and made plain and easie to a mean capacity / by John Smith ...
titleStmt.author: Smith, John, 1630-1679.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Hayes for S. Thomson ...,

notesStmt.note: Published later (1676) as: The pourtract of old age.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
